<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Express Driver](/Feats.aspx?ID=3141) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 55 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Trick Driver](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=112)

**Prerequisites**
[Trick Driver Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3140)

</column>

---

You can optimize your [vehicle's](Vehicles.aspx) performance, coaxing extra speed and choosing paths to avoid slowdowns. When calculating your travel speed for the day while piloting a vehicle, you can attempt a [Driving Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) check to increase your vehicle's travel speed. The DC is determined by the GM but is typically based on the vehicle's piloting DC or a difficulty based on the environment, whichever is harder. On a success, increase your vehicle's travel speed by half. This has no effect on your vehicle's movement in encounters.
name: Express Driver
